articles.title: China's digital yuan wallets swell but usage lags - Reuters
articles.description: China's digital currency has debuted on app stores with fanfare, with online wallets for the electronic yuan seeing mass adoption in the two weeks since a public launch, yet its actual use in transactions has been far less impressive.
